title: Grateful Dead Live at Meadowlands Arena on 1984-10-18
source: Source from Doug Oade: 90 degree, 17cm Schoeps CMC441s at Sbd into an Oade power supply > modified Sony TCD-D5M. Later, Sony TCD-D5M > DAW (via SEKD Prodif) > Wav16/44 (set 1) & 16/48 (set 2); Transfer and mastering by droncit 4/29/2014
